name: Tower 57
description: Tower 57 is a fast-paced neo-retro shooter where cooperation is as important as your ammo capacity. As a member of an extraordinary task force fight your way through a dieselpunk megatower and uncover its hidden secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8 or 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
